name: Mom
quote: "Come here, baby. Momma's gonna make it all better..."
abilities: Gains +1 from each 'Young' or 'Family' Character cast in the same Movie. May be played as a 'Psycho' attack with an Attack = 8 + 1 for each 'Young' Character in the target Movie.
title: House

name: Big Sister
quote: "Because mom left ME in charge, that's why! Now where's the machete?"
abilities: Gains +2 Defense for each 'Young' 'Family' Character cast in the same Movie.
title: Sibling

name: Annoying Little Brother
quote: "You better take me with you, or I'm telling mom you're a bloodsucking vampire!"
abilities: May not use 'Guns'. May not be the target of Creature attacks.
title: Annoying

name: Grampa
quote: "What'd I tell you kids about playing with dead things? AFTER homework!"
abilities: Once per attack against your Movie — If there is a 'Young' Character in your Movie, you may pay 3 Popcorn to stop the attack.
title: Ancient

name: Council of Deranged Fascists
quote: "For the greater good." "The greater gooood."
abilities:
'Psycho' — Any Player may play 'Weapon' Props to boost the Fascists' attack for free.

Attack = 20 when attacking a 'Neighborhood' Location.
title: Vs.

name: Killer Toys
quote: "It's a DOLL! Just kick it into the closet and close the door!" "We can do that?"
abilities: If the Toys fail, they return to their Controller's hand. They may not be used again this turn.
title: Minions

name: Lovers' Lane
quote: "Looks like a parking lot. Since the bowling alley shut down there really isn't anything else to do in this town."
abilities: 'Psycho' attacks always succeed at Lovers' Lane.
title: Unrequited

name: Trailer Park
quote: "Why are we trying to save these people again?"
abilities: All 'Family' Characters in this Location gain +1 Defense.
title: Cult

name: Comic Books
quote: "This is just like the time Captain Piñata fought the Zombie Queen!"
abilities: Pay 2 Popcorn — If on a 'Young' Character, stop a 'Supernatural' or 'Monster' attack made against your Movie.
title: Hero

name: Ouija Board
quote: "Come in Elvis! Are you there, Elvis?"
abilities: Pay 3 Popcorn — Stop a 'Supernatural' attack made against your Movie.
title: Premonition

name: Ha! Ha! Scared Ya!
quote: "You should see the look on your face..."
abilities: Stop one Creature attack. The Creature is returned to the attacking Player's hand and that Player may not make any more Creature attacks that turn.
title: Darkness

name: Scream Queen
quote: "You're not scared are you?" "Trust me, if I was afraid, you'd hear all about it."
abilities:
Attach to a 'Female' Character. 
Pay 3 Popcorn — Stop an attack made against your Movie.
title: Shriek

name: Cat in the Closet
quote: "They even managed to pull this in Alien."
abilities: Stop any card as it is being played. It is discarded. This cannot stop a Plot Twist or Roll the Credits.
title: Surprise

name:
And Their Family Was
Cursed For Generations...
quote: "...upon your father's, father's, father's head!"
abilities: Starting next turn, when you have at least 2 'Family' Characters in your Movie, you may reveal this Twist. Attach it to the 'Family' member with the lowest Defense. At the end of each of your turns, whoever has the Curse dies. When its bearer dies, the Curse attaches to the next lowest. If the Curse, itself, has killed at least 2 'Family' Characters, and there are none left, Bank it. Otherwise discard it.
title: Curse

name:
And We Learn the Sins
of the Father!
quote: "D-dad...? Is that you?"
abilities: Play with a Creature face-down under it. If there is at least one 'Family' Character in your Movie and it is attacked, you may choose to bank this Twist. If you do so, reveal the Creature and add its Attack to your Movie's Defense for the duration of the attack. Afterwards the Creature returns to your hand.
title: Father

name: Roll The Credits (1)
quote: "Well we managed to escape the house of horror, so it must be over!"
title: Family

name: High School Vice Principal
quote: "I've had just about enough of your antics, Billy... say is that a tentacle?"
abilities: 'Unlucky' in any 'School' (if there is a choice of Characters to die in his Movie, he must be chosen first).
title: Heathen

name: Bookish Girl With No Boyfriend
quote: "No, that's okay, you guys go skinny dipping. I'll just stay here and read..."
abilities: Gets +2 Defense from each 'Book' Prop she has.
title: Virgin

name: Prom Queen
quote: "The pig's blood really brings out her eyes."
abilities: Prom Queen cannot be targeted by a Creature attack unless she is in a 'School'.
title: Slasher

name: The Gym Teacher
quote: "Everyone knows you don't become a gym teacher unless Satan tells you to."
abilities: Attacker must declare whether the Gym Teacher is 'Alien' or 'Psycho' when played. Always succeeds when attacking a 'School'.
title: Pain

name: Teenaged Wolfman
quote: "Boys, when they hit a certain age, start experiencing... changes."
abilities: Always succeeds in 'Neighborhood' Locations.
title: Wolf

name: Evil Robot
quote: "FUMIGATE! FUMIGATE!" "Don't you mean 'exterminate'?" "WHATEVER!"
abilities:
Psycho — Any Player may play 'Weapon' Props to boost the Robot's Attack for free.

Cannot attack 'Aquatic' Locations.
title: Mechanical

name: High School
quote: "I'm not going back there! That place is full of mutants and monsters!" "But darling, you have to. You're the principal."
abilities: Defense = 5 if you have cast the "High School Vice Principal".
title: Orgy

name: Back Seat of the Car
quote: "Billy, noooo. Stop it... Well okay, just this once... Say, is that a tentacle?"
title: Boyfriend

name: Spell Book
quote: "Why is it always Latin?"
abilities: Pay 2 Popcorn — If on a 'Smart' Character, stop a 'Supernatural' attack made against your Movie.
title: Demon

name: Book of the Dead
quote: "Klaatu! Berada!... Necktie..."
abilities: 'Zombie' attacks made against your Movie cost 1 additional Popcorn.
title: Flesh-eating

name: Cult Classic
quote: "I can't believe you haven't seen 'Teenage Blood Feast'..."
abilities: Draw two extra cards.
title: Unchained

name: Let's Go Skinny Dipping
quote: "While we wait for Billy to get back, why don't we go for a swim?"
abilities: After this card is played, you must pay one Popcorn for each 'Young' non-'Virgin' Character in the target movie. If you do so, they are all now dead.
title: Naked

name:
We've Seen Your Breasts
Now You Must Die!
quote: "Never canoodle in a horror movie. EVER."
abilities: Kill one non-'Virgin' 'Female' Character.
title: Revealed

name: But Right Before the Prom...
quote: "Will you go to the Prom with me?" "Of course! I was a bit hungry..."
abilities: Starting your next turn, you may choose to Bank this twist if you have a 'Male' and 'Female' Character in your Movie. If you do so, kill one of them, Bank their printed Defense, and you may make a 'Supernatural' attack against an Opponent of your choice at 3x their combined Defense.
title: Date

name:
Despite Everything
They All Graduated!
quote: "Congratulations to the graduating class of Amityville High!"
abilities: Starting your next turn, you may bank this twist if you have at least two 'Young' Characters in your Movie. All 'Young' Characters in your Movie are 'Smart' and have +2 Defense. (This does not stack with "Edjumicated".)
title: School

name: Roll The Credits (2)
quote: "Well the school blew up and the monsters are all gone, so I guess it must be over!"
title: Education

name: Creepy Old Innkeeper
quote: "I guess you'll be wantin' to take a shower?"
abilities: May be played as a 'Psycho' attack with an Attack Strength of 10 + the number of 'Female' Characters in the defending Movie.
title: Devil

name: Spoiled Little Rich Girl
quote: "Billy may have come camping with YOU, but he's coming home with ME... Or in a body bag..."
abilities: Your hand limit is increased by 1 while she is cast in your Movie.
title: Jealous

name: Park Ranger
quote: "That howl? Probably just a werewolf..."
abilities: Defense = 5 in any 'Natural' Location.
title: Mysterious

name: Arachnophobia
quote: "A phobia is an irrational fear. There is NOTHING irrational about fearing these creepy-crawly bastards!"
abilities: 'Swarm' – 'Weapon' Props' Defense = 0 against Arachnophobia.
title: Spider

name: Blob Monster
quote: "J-E-L-L-Uh oh!"
abilities: Gains +1 Attack for each Character in the targeted Movie.
title: Acrid

name: Space Critters
quote: "Awwww! It's so cute, yes it is... AAAAAAH! It ate my face!"
abilities: If Space Critters fails against a Movie with a 'Young' Character in it, once the attack is over it is cast in that Movie as a Character with Defense = 4 and the trait 'Smart'.
title: Aliens

name: Camp Lake Zirconia
quote: "I've never seen a summer camp with its own morgue before." "You wouldn't believe how often it comes in handy..."
abilities: 'Psycho' attacks always succeed at the Camp.
title: Psycho

name: Cabin in the Woods
quote: "Did we leave the door open?" "Must have been the wind."
abilities: Defense = -4 against 'Psycho' attacks.
title: Abandoned

name: Row Boat
quote: "Row, row, row your boat, gently to your death."
abilities: Defense = 6 when at an 'Aquatic' Location.
title: Drowning

name: Recreational Vehicle
quote: "It may not be fast, but you should see the way it crushes zombies!"
abilities: Pay 3 Popcorn — Stop a 'Zombie' attack made against your Movie.
title: Lost

name: Let's Split Up
quote: "You stay here by yourself, and I'll go see what happened to everyone else..."
abilities: Play with a Creature. Single out one Character to be the intended victim of the current attack. The Defense and Abilities of all other Characters are ignored until the end of the attack.
title: Death

name: Campy 60s Crossover
quote: "Abbott & Costello meet the Blob? You've gotta be kidding me!"
abilities: You may Combine a Creature card from your hand to join the current attack at no extra cost. The Traits and Abilities of both Creatures apply, and if successful you may kill an additional Character.
title: Shadow

name: Cabin Fever
quote: "I can't breathe! I've got to get out of here... GAH! ARGH! GURGLE!"
abilities: One Location's Defense = -3 until the end of the current attack.
title: Desperate

name: And They Got Lost in the Dark!
quote: "Oh no! They got Billy!"
abilities: You may choose to bank this Twist when you have more than one Character in play and an Opponent has choosen a victim after a successful attack against you. Turn all of your Characters face down, shuffle them up, and have the Opponent choose one at random. That Character dies. Bank their printed Defense. You may redistribute their Props among your other Characters.
title: Blackness

name:
And They Just Kept Coming
Out of the Woods!
quote: "There's gotta be a nest of them somewhere..."
abilities: Starting your next turn, you may bank this Twist when you have at least one 'Monster' in your Graveyard. If you do, provided there isn't one there already, once per turn you may take a 'Monster' of your choice from your Graveyard and place it face-up, under this card. You may attack with that 'Monster' as if it was in your hand, but afterwards it is removed from the game.
title: Woods

name: Roll The Credits (3)
quote: "Look! Sunlight! We made it!"
title: Forest

name: Space Bounty Hunter
quote: "See that cute thing? It'll eat your face."
abilities: Defense = 8 during 'Alien' attacks.
title: Captured

name: Reporter
quote: "Can you confirm the reports of a giant lizard running amok? ... Chrissy? We're live... Chrissy?"
abilities: Pay 2 Popcorn — Force a target Opponent to reveal their hand.
title: Revenge

name: Hapless Alien Visitor
quote: "Take me to your bleep-blorp-darn this translator unit!"
abilities: Defense = 6 during 'Alien' attacks.
title: Silent

name: Pod People
quote: "Join us... Join us... C'mon just join us already!"
abilities: If the Pod People are successful, instead of killing a victim, you may choose to steal any number of the defending Player's Characters into your Movie for an additional 2 Popcorn each. Any cards attached to any such Characters are discarded.
title: Swarm

name: Space Mimic From Uranus
quote: "Don't worry, buddy. I'm right behind you!"
abilities: If successful, the Mimic is attached to the Character in the victim's Movie with the lowest printed Defense (Attacker chooses if there's a tie). At the end of that Player's turn, it kills that Character and is attached the next-lowest. If there are no Characters left, or the Character it's attached to is killed, it dies.
title: Secret

name: Grave Robbers From Outer Space
quote: "Stupid Earthlings! See how they bury their dead instead of harvesting the parts for science...and SOUP!"
abilities: Gains +1 Attack for every Character in the Defender's Graveyard when Grave Robbers was played.
title: Forbidden

name: Alien Headquarters
quote: "SHHHHHH!" "I didn't say anything." "That wasn't me. I think it was the door..."
abilities: Defense = -5 against 'Alien' attacks.
title: Intergalactic

name: Secret Government Lab
quote: "Has this door always been here?" "Sure." "What about the retinal scanner?"
abilities: May be Combined with any non-'Underground' Location.
title: Coverup

name: Flashlight
quote: "Great! Now we can see it before it kills us."
abilities: Defense = 4 in any 'Underground' Location.
title: Three-Headed

name: Rifle
quote: "What do you mean guns don't work?" BLAM! "Works for me!"
title: Shot

name: Rayguns
quote: "What do you think this button does?"
abilities: Double or halve the strength of the current 'Alien' attack.
title: Laser

name: We Come In Peace
quote: "Awww! They're like little children." "Children who've mastered interstellar travel?"
abilities: Add +5 to the current Defense, or stop one 'Alien' attack. Put that 'Alien' into your hand if you have the Military Officer in your Movie.
title: Calm

name: Flying Saucers
quote: "Actually, it's just a hubcap on some wire."
abilities: The current attack gains +5 Attack and the Trait 'Alien'. If it was already 'Alien' you may double its Attack instead.
title: Planet

name:
And They Were Killed
By Something Innocuous...
quote: "They were killed by common bacteria?!"
abilities: Starting your next turn, you may choose to bank this Twist if you have a NON-'Weapon' Prop in your Movie, and have either an 'Alien' in your Movie or were just attacked by an 'Alien'. If so, stop or discard the 'Alien' and choose a Trait from one of your NON-'Weapon' Props. All Props in your Movie with that Trait have double Defense.
title: Microbes

name:
And It Was Suddenly
Intergalactic War!
quote: "I'm Mary Poppins, y'all!" "What?" "Sorry..."
abilities: Play with an 'Alien' Creature face-down under it. When your Movie is attacked by an 'Alien', you may choose to bank this Twist. If you do so, reveal the 'Alien' and add its Attack to your Movie's Defense for the duration of the attack. Afterwards the Creature returns to your hand.
title: Ex Machina

name: Roll The Credits (4)
quote: "Keep watching the skies!"
title: Space

name: Military Officer
quote: "You're out of uniform, soldier. Unpolished boots, blood on your coat. Is that brain caught between your teeth?"
abilities: You may issue the Military Officer two Props each turn so long as one is a 'Weapon'.
title: Authority

name: Beat Cop
quote: "To protect and sever... Wait, what??"
abilities:
May be played as a 'Psycho' attack with Attack Strength = 10.
'Cop' — Gains 2x the bonus from Gun Props.
title: Cyborg

name: Post Apocalyptic Highway Warrior
quote: "I'd be mad, too, if I had to wear old tires like that."
abilities: Gains +2 Defense for every 'Vehicle' in the same Movie.
title: Army

name: Carnivore Slugs
quote: "Ewwwww! Why is my seat all slimy?"
abilities: 'Swarm' — 'Weapon' Props' Defense = 0 against the Slugs.
title: Dreadful

name: Say, is That a Tentacle?
quote: "I didn't order the calamari... GAH! ARGH! GURGLE!"
abilities:
'Aquatic' — Attack Strength is double if attacking an 'Aquatic' Location.
After this attack is over, the target Player puts the top 3 cards of their Deck into the Graveyard.
title: Tentacle

name: Horde of Little Monsters
quote: "So this guy buys a little monster for his kid as a Christmas gift? Top notch parenting."
abilities: Gains +2 Attack for each Prop in the target Movie.
title: Thirteen

name: Old Nuclear Test Grounds
quote: "The mutants around here pronounce it "nuke-u-lar."
abilities: Whenever an attack is made at the Test Grounds, any Player(s) may pay for and Combine a 'Monster' Creature of their own with the attack, and if successful they may kill another Character.
title: Wasteland

name: Abandoned Building
quote: "Looks spooky, but maybe they have a phone." "Yeah, a spooky phone."
abilities: When this card leaves play, put it and 5 random cards from your Graveyard on the bottom of your Deck.
title: Hollow

name: Pistol
quote: BLAM! BLAM! BLAM! BLAM! BLAM! BLAM! Click, click, click... "Crap!"
abilities: If the Pistol is in your Graveyard, you may pay 3 Popcorn to shuffle it back into your Deck.
title: Armed

name: Flamethrower
quote: "Now we're cooking with heat!"
abilities: The Flamethrower's Defense counts against 'Swarm' attacks.
title: Inferno

name: Back to the Home
quote: "What are you doing way out here at this time of night, Gramps?"
abilities: Kill any one 'Old' Character.
title: Demonic

name: Aim Fer the Head, Boys!
quote: "Eat lead, ya brain-slurpin' undead bastard!"
abilities: Play to stop a 'Zombie' attack as long as the target Movie has at least one 'Gun' Prop OR add +3 Defense against any attack for each 'Gun' in target the Movie.
title: Decapitated

name: Director's Cut
quote: "MY movie does NOT need a voice over!"
abilities: Reverse the outcome of one attack after it has been resolved. (If it's a success, it's a failure, and vice-versa.)
title: Scream

name: Chekov's Gun
quote: "Rule #1 of Chekov's Gun: Have a gun."
abilities: When your Movie is attacked and there is a 'Gun' Prop in your Graveyard whose added Defense would alter the outcome, you may bank this Twist and play the 'Gun' on one of your Characters for free, ignoring the Prop Limit.
title: Battle

name:
And They Built Him Stronger,
More Aggressive!
quote: "Protect the innocent, uphold the law!"
abilities: Starting your next turn, you may bank this Twist when you have a 'Cop' or 'Military' Character and a 'Gun' Prop in your Graveyard. If you do, play the Character in your Movie and remove the Prop from play. They now have the Trait 'Cyborg' and the added Defense and Abilities of the Prop as if they were carrying it. Bank the Character's printed Defense.
title: Machine

name: Roll The Credits (5)
quote: "Nice shootin' son. What's your name?"
title: Cop

name: The Guy Everyone Knows Will Get Killed
quote: "I know there's a killer on the loose, so I'm going to wander around in the dark..."
abilities: 'Unlucky' – If there is ever a choice of Characters to kill in his Movie, this guy must be chosen first.
title: Radioactive

name: Nervous Girl
quote: "You SAY it's going to be okay, but YOU DON'T KNOW! Billy said the same thing and look what happened to him!"
abilities: Pay 2 Popcorn — Make the Nervous Girl the target of a Creature attack made against your Movie.
title: Insane

name: Teenaged Hoodlum
quote: "I'll stand on your lawn if I want to, old man!"
abilities: Gains +1 Defense for each 'Weapon' he has. Loses -1 Defense for each 'Old' Character in the same Movie.
title: Tunnel

name: Zombies From Hell
quote: "I thought we weren't using the Z-word..."
abilities: When Zombies From Hell are played, the Attacker may choose to give them the trait 'Supernatural'.
title: Clutches

name: Mummy
quote: "Just look at how beautifully preserved he... GAK! ARGH! GURGLE!"
abilities: The Mummy always succeeds when attacking a 'Mortuary'.
title: Tomb

name: Severed Body Parts
quote: "If those are your hands, whose hand is ON MY THIGH???"
abilities: Regardless of how it resolves, after this attack is over, place Body Parts on the bottom of the Deck.
title: Pagan

name: Tomb
quote: "The inscription reads, 'All who enter the sacred resting place of Ra-tep shall suffer most hideous death.' Okay, let's go in."
abilities: Defense = -5 during 'Supernatural' attacks.
title: Terror

name: House By the Cemetery
quote: "What's it like living next to a cemetery?" "Quiet. Usually..."
abilities: Defense = -3 during 'Zombie' or 'Vampire' attacks. Can be combined with any 'Mortuary'.
title: Undead

name: Chainsaw
quote: "Groovy."
abilities: Adds +12 to an attack when played on a 'Psycho'.
title: Tearing

name: Shotgun
quote: "Good... Bad... I'm the one with the gun."
abilities: On your turn you may either put the top card of the Graveyard under the Deck OR put the top card of the Deck into the Graveyard.
title: Part IV

name:
Oh My God,
They Got Billy!
quote: "Billy, are you okay? Say something, pal." "Braaaaains!" "Say something else?"
abilities: Take a Character from the Graveyard and use it to make a 'Supernatural' 'Zombie' attack with a strength triple the Character's printed Defense.
title: Curse

name: Reinforcements
quote: "I can control the Armies of the Dead? Cool!"
abilities: Double either the Attacker or Defender's current strength.
title: Howling

name: Continuity Schmontinuity
quote: "Didn't that guy die like twenty minutes ago?"
abilities: Take a Character out of the Graveyard and put it into play in the Movie of your choice at no extra cost.
title: Meets

name: And They Rose From The Grave!
quote: "Arise! Serve me!" NNNGH! NNNGH!
abilities: Starting your next turn, when you have at least three Characters in your Graveyard you may Bank this Twist. If you do, play 3 of them into your Movie for free. They are now 'Dumb', 'Supernatural', and 'Zombie', and cannot use Abilities, Popcorn, or Props.
title: Shambling

name: And It Came Back With Reinforcements!
quote: "The zombies are coordinating with each other!"
abilities: Starting your next turn, you may bank this Twist when you have at least two Creatures in your Graveyard. If you do, you may attack a target Opponent with any two Creatures in your Graveyard combined into a single attack (they combine Attack and Abilities) with the additional Traits 'Supernatural' and 'Zombie'. If successful you may kill an additional Character.
title: Hordes

name: Roll The Credits (7)
quote: "Well, the cops came by and shot the last survivor, so I guess it's over!"
title: Zombie

name: Robot
quote: "I may be only a robot, but you cannot Ctrl+Alt+Del my heart."
abilities: Pay 3 Popcorn — Save a 'Young' Character who has just been killed in your Movie. They stay in play rather than go to the Graveyard.
title: Massacre

name: Wasteland Cyborg
quote:
"Metal Fleshman of Garbage Country?"
"Well, it loses something in translation..."
abilities: Gains +3 Defense if in a 'Scientific' Location.
title: Skull

name: Skippy the Wonder Dog
quote: "What's that Skippy? Billy's torso is down the well?"
abilities: 'Animal' - May only use 'Clothing' Props.
title: Companion

name: Genetically Monsterized Organism
quote: "Half human, half snake. All Manaconda!"
abilities: When played, you may give the GMO any number of Creature Traits you like from among the Creatures currently in the targeted Movie's Graveyard. Each Trait added this way gives the GMO +5 Attack.
title: Tainted

name: Mad Scientist
quote: "And they called me MAD at the community college...!"
abilities:
'Psycho' — Any Player may play 'Weapon' Props to boost the Doctor's attack for free.

May be played as a Special Effect to triple the current strength of an attack.
title: Dungeon

name: Crazed Doctor
quote: "Life is a terminal illness... And the only cure is death."
abilities:
'Psycho' — Any Player may play 'Weapon' Props to boost the Doctor's attack for free.

Always succeeds when attacking a 'Hospital'.
title: Suicide

name: Insane Asylum
quote: "Attention patients: Lithium is no longer available on credit."
abilities: Pay 2 Popcorn on your turn — Choose one of your Characters. Make a 'Psycho' attack against another Movie with an Attack equal to their Defense and attached cards. You may not choose that Character again this turn.
title: Sub-Human

name: LaBORatory
quote: "It's alive. ALIVE!!!"
abilities: Pay 3 Popcorn on your turn — Bring a Character back from the Graveyard. They are now 'Dumb', may only use 'Clothing' Props.
title: Risen

name: Toolkit
quote: "Let's see, I know I have one of those bastards in here somewhere..."
abilities: Pay 2 Popcorn on your turn — Take a Prop from the Graveyard and put it into your hand.
title: Ghost

name: First Aid Kit
quote: "I've never treated a chainsaw wound to the head before, but what the hell... Hand me the iodine!"
abilities: Discard from your Movie to take a Character from your Graveyard and cast them in your Movie for free.
title: Creature

name: Cut!
quote: "What do you mean we can't afford to do a second take?"
abilities: Stop and discard one Special Effect card as it is being played.
title: X-Ray

name:
Good God!
They're Radioactive!
quote: "Hey, turn out the light." "I already did..."
abilities: Double the current strength of a Creature.
title: Murder

name:
It Was a Dark
and Stormy Night
quote: "Oh great, purple lightning. That's never a good sign."
abilities: Play this card in your Movie. All attacks made until the start of your next turn are double strength, after which it is discarded.
title: Terrible

name: And It Killed Its Creator!
quote: "No! No! I gave you life! GAK! ARGH! GURGLE!"
abilities: When this card is placed face-down, put a 'Monster' Creature face down under it. Starting next turn, on your turn you may bank this Twist by killing one of your Characters. If you do, you may immediately attack an Opponent of your choice with the 'Monster' for free with a bonus of twice the Defense of the sacrificed Character.
title: Lives

name:
And Then The Doomsday Device
Went Off!
quote: "But then EVERYONE will die!" "Yes! Bwahaha! Wait... what?"
abilities: Starting your next turn, you may bank this Twist when you have the most Characters in play (ties don't count). If you do, all Characters in all Movies are killed.
title: Annihilation

name: Roll The Credits (7)
quote: "Well, the Doctor's dead and his creation is wandering off into the moonlight, so I guess it's over!"
title: Science

name: Old Priest
quote: "Holy Christ, you scared the bejesus outta me!"
abilities: Defense = 6 during 'Supernatural' attacks.
title: Maniac

name: Aged Vampire Hunter
quote: "The cardinal rule of hunting vampires is that one vampire is much easier to kill than ten."
abilities: Defense = 6 against 'Vampire' attacks.
title: Satanic

name: Fortune Teller
quote: "I look into your future and see... GAK! ARGH! GURGLE..."
abilities: You may look at the top card of your deck at any time.
title: Spell

name: Dracula
quote: "Make mine a Bloody Mary. Or a Bloody Sally. Hell, I'll even take a Bloody Steve at this point! I'm famished!"
abilities: If an attack with Dracula is successful, you may discard a Character or Creature from your hand to take Dracula back into your hand.
title: Dracula

name: Subterranean Cannibals
quote: "Anybody else think this clown tastes funny?"
abilities:
'Psycho' — Any Player may play 'Weapon' Props to boost the Cannibals' attack for free.

If the Cannibals are successful, put the top 3 cards of the targeted Movie's Deck into the Graveyard.
title: Under

name: Vampire Beach Babes
quote: "Gotta love a girl with an oral fixation..."
abilities: Attacker may declare them 'Aquatic' when played. Beach Babes always succeeds 'Aquatic' Locations.
title: Seduction

name: Old Church
quote: "We're on a mission from God..."
abilities: Immediately after filling up at the beginning of your turn, discard a card from your hand or discard the Old Church. It is automatically discarded if you ever skip a turn.
title: Unholy

name: Haunted Hotel
quote: "On a dark desert highway..."
abilities: The Axe's Defense = 8 in the Haunted Hotel. "Creepy Old Inkeeper" always succeeds when attacking this Location.
title: Invisible

name: Holy Relics
quote: "Holy water, silver bullets, crucifix... this thing's got everything. It's like God's Swiss Army knife!"
abilities: During 'Supernatural' attacks, Defense = 4, or = 10 in the hands of the "Aged Vampire Hunter", or = 12 with the "Old Priest".
title: Ritual

name: Black Cloak
quote: "Like a Snuggie, but eeeeevil."
abilities: The Character wearing the Cloak may not be targeted by Creature attacks unless there is no other choice. This will not protect 'Unlucky' Characters, however.
title: Liar

name:
But It Was Here Just a
Minute Ago
quote: "Never fear! Vampires can always be thwarted by... say, has anyone seen my holy amulet of Saint Shrivens?"
abilities: Discard any one Prop from play.
title: Eyeball

name: Why Won't You Die?
quote: "I guess getting mulched by a farm combine isn't as fatal as it used to be...."
abilities: After the current Creature attack is over, put the Creature into your hand.
title: Fear

name: Haunted
quote: "Cool! The walls paint themselves!" "That's not paint, idiot. It's blood."
abilities: Attach to a Location. That Location's Defense = -7 against 'Supernatural' attacks.
title: Dead

name: And They Found Its Coffin!
quote: "This is where it sleeps!" "So where are THEY?!"
abilities: Starting your next turn, you may bank this Twist when you have at least one 'Vampire' in your Graveyard. If you do, provided there isn't one there already, once per turn you may take a 'Vampire' of your choice from your Graveyard and place it face-up under this card. You may attack with that 'Vampire' as if it was in your hand, but afterwards it is removed from the game.
title: Sepulchure

name: And They Were Seduced By The Vampire!
quote: "I don't get it. Why do chicks think they're sexy?"
abilities: You may bank this Twist if a 'Vampire' attack you launched successfully killed a Character. You may immediately make a 'Supernatural' 'Vampire' attack against the same Movie at 3x that Character's printed Defense.
title: Vampiress

name: Roll The Credits (8)
quote: "Well the vampire just became a pile of dust, so I guess it's over!"
title: Nosferatu

name: Nymphomaniac Cheerleader
quote:
"Give me an O! Give me an O!
O-O-O-O YES!"
abilities: All 'Males' cast in the same Movie gain +1 Defense.
title: Woman

name: Big Dumb Jock
quote: "Dude! Beer me!"
abilities: When the Big Dumb Jock is killed, he goes to the bottom of the Deck, rather than the Graveyard.
title: Youth

name: Coed Science Major
quote: "How do we stop this thing?" "Why are you asking ME?" "You are the one with the degrees, aren't you?"
abilities: When Coed Science Major leaves play, the Opponent who killed her puts the top 3 cards of their Deck into the Graveyard.
title: Girlfriend

name: Masked Stalker
quote: "Is that a chainsaw in your pocket, or are you just happy to see me? Oh it's a chainsaw... AAAAAAAAAH!"
abilities: 'Psycho' — Any Player may play 'Weapon' Props to boost the Masked Stalker's Attack for free.
title: Coed

name: Bloodsucking Fiends
quote: "Is that guy sparkling?" "Yeah... he's not with us."
abilities: May be combined with another 'Vampire' attack. The resulting attack has the combined Attack and all the Traits and Abilities of both, and if successful you may kill an additional Character.
title: Damned

name: Brain Slug Zombies
quote: "It only hurts a little, when the slug burrows into your brain..."
title: Mindless

name: College Campus
quote: "It's not the Student Body that bothers me... it's all the student bodies."
abilities: Can be Combined with the "Sorority House". Defense = 6 if any 'College' Character is present.
title: Pledge

name: Sorority House
quote: "Teehee! Let's have a pillowfight in our underwear!"
abilities: Defense = -3 during 'Psycho' attacks.
title: Teenage

name: Axe
quote: "Heeeeeeeeeere's Johnny!"
title: Fifty Foot

name: Mask
quote: "We all wear a mask at some time or another." "Yeah, but yours is covered in blood."
abilities: The Character wearing the Mask cannot be targeted by Special Effect cards. May be played as a 'Weapon' on the "Masked Stalker" to make him automatically succeed.
title: Black

name: Too Stupid to Live
quote: "You're so stupid it's painful. Not to you, but to those around you."
abilities: Kill one 'Dumb' Character.
title: Man-Eating

name: Only the Virgin Survives
quote: "Never have sex in a horror movie. EVER."
abilities: Kill a 'Male' and non-'Virgin' 'Female' Character in the same Movie.
title: Sucking

name: Edjumicated
quote: "I gots me a diploma!"
abilities: Attach this card to a Character. They get +2 Defense and the trait 'Smart'. If the Character had the trait 'Dumb', they no longer do.
title: Wisened

name: And They Actually Paid Attention!
quote: "Wait a sec... we learned about its weakness in Tropeology class!"
abilities: You may bank this Twist if your Movie is under attack and there is at least one Prop in it. If you do, attach this card to a Prop in your Movie. Its Defense is now triple.
title: Scholar

name: And Pledge Week Turned Deadly!
quote: "I dunno man..." "Hey, everybody's doing it!"
abilities: Starting your next turn, you may bank this twist when you have at least 2 'Young' or 'College' Characters in your Movie. If you do, you may make a 'Psycho' attack against an Opponent's Movie, the strength of which is equal to your 'Young' and 'College' Characters' total Defense, including all attached cards.
title: Frat

name: Roll The Credits (9)
quote: "Well, they're awake in a hospital and there's no sign of the slasher, so it must be over!"
title: College

name: Fat Kid
quote: "I don't have to be fast, I just have to be—" "Oh shut up!"
abilities: 'Unlucky' - Whenever there is a choice of Characters to kill in this Movie, this one must be chosen first.'
title: Hulking

name: Goth Chick
quote: "I am one with all creatures of the darkness… EWW, it's a bug! Get it off me!"
abilities: Defense = -5 against 'Vampire' attacks.
title: Goth

name: Teenage Boy Desperate to Get Some
quote: "I don't believe it, NOW my PANTS are chafing me…"
abilities: +1 Defense for every 'Young' 'Female' Character in the same Movie.
title: Ogling

name: Evil Teenage Witches
quote: "So first we light the candles and call the elements, then we rip out the sacrifice's heart… then we go get lattes, right?"
abilities: +1 Attack for each 'Young' Character in the target Movie.
title: Coven

name: Teenage Vampire Hoods
quote: "Live forever, never grow old and no more curfew!"
abilities: Gains +2 Attack for every 'Neighborhood' card in the target Movie.
title: Hoods

name: 12,000 Angry Rats
quote: "There were rats, dad..." "Rats??"
abilities: 'Swarm' — 'Weapon' Props' Defense = 0 against 12,000 Angry Rats.
title: Infestation

name: 10-Speed
quote: "Is one of the speeds 'get me the hell out of here'?"
abilities: Defense = 4 on a 'Young' Character.
title: Ride

name: Skateboard
quote: "Taste deck…" WHAM! "… you no good…" WHAM! "...undead punk!" WHAM!
abilities: Discard the Skateboard from play to gain +5 DS for the duration of the current attack.
title: Grind

name: The Mall
quote: "Does this brain make me look fat?"
abilities: 'Zombie' attacks always succeed in The Mall.
title: Shop

name: Department Store
quote: "Attention Zombie shoppers!"
abilities: Once per turn, for three Popcorn you may take any one Prop out of your Graveyard and put it into play in your Movie. May be combined with "The Mall".
title: Discount

name: Allowance
quote: "Gimmie! Gimmie!"
abilities: Draw 1 card for each 'Young' Character in your Movie.
title: Greed

name: Double Feature Creature Show
quote: "At the late night, double feature picture show..."
abilities: You may Combine a Creature card from you hand to join the current 'Monster', 'Supernatural', or 'Vampire' attack at no extra cost. The Traits and Abilities of both apply, and if successful you may kill an additional Character.
title: Two-Headed

name: Kick To the Groin
quote: "They never used to fight back so hard."
abilities: Add +5 DS for the duration of the current attack OR stop one 'Psycho' attack.
title: Strikes

name:
And They Were Secretly
Bitten All Along!
quote: "Billy! You should have told us!"
abilities: When your Character with the highest Defense is killed, you may bank this Twist. If you do so, you may immediately Bank their printed Defense, and attack the Player's Movie who killed them with a 'Supernatural' 'Zombie' attack with a strength of 3x that Character's Defense, plus any bonuses from attached cards they had when they died.
title: Festering

name:
And the Monsters Started
a Turf War!
quote: "It's a battle of the brands!"
abilities: If your Movie is set in a 'Shop' and you have a Creature in your hand, when you are attacked you may bank this Twist. If you do, reveal a Creature from your hand. Add the Creature's strength to your Movie's Defense for the duration of the attack. After the attack is resolved, discard the Creature.
title: Sale

name: Roll The Credits (10)
quote: "Well, the helicopter took off from the roof leaving the zombies behind, so I guess it's over!"
title: Mall
